sn54.20:1.2: Kathaṁ bhāvito ca, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṁ bahulīkato saṁyojanappahānāya saṁvattati …
sn54.20:1.6: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā …pe…
sn54.20:1.7: paṭinissaggānupassī assasissāmīti sikkhati, paṭinissaggānupassī passasissāmīti sikkhati.
sn54.20:1.8: Evaṁ bhāvito kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhi evaṁ bahulīkato saṁyojanappahānāya saṁvattati …pe…
